charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_1101_0:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking down
a path in the forest when suddenly [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard
someone calling out to [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_1201_0:
Hey there! Elesa and I were just doing some
special training!
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_0401_0:
Of course, our Pokémon are here with us, too.
They’re playing in the forest.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_0402_0:
They’re here with us, too. They’re playing in
the forest.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_1201_0:
I’ve found that the best way to train Emolga is to
let her do what she wants.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_1101_1:
Skyla pointed to a spot where
[Name:PlayerNickname ] could see Pokémon
frolicking about and having fun.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_1201_1:
I wonder if Emolga and Swanna are flying around
and driving Zebstrika and Rotom up the wall.

Swanna and Emolga both fly, so they make great
partners in crime, don’t they? Look at them go!
They’ve got so much more energy than usual!

It might look like they’re all just having fun, but
this is good for them! They’re pushing each other
to up their game.

Sometimes it’s good to have a strict training
regimen, but there are some things Pokémon can
only learn by letting loose.

Hey there, Emolga. Did you come to say hello
to [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

I really envy the bond that Elesa and Emolga have.
Just look at them!

Oh yeah. Emolga and I go waaaay back. We’ve
been battling together since my days at Nimbasa
City Gym.

Since we came to Pasio, she’s been giving it her
all. She’s done an awesome job keeping up with
Zebstrika and everyone else.

Speaking of the old days—whenever I change into
this outfit, it brings me back to when I first
became a Gym Leader.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_0301_2: It’s an outfit with a story!
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_0401_2:
Yep, it sure is. This is what I was wearing when
I set off toward my dream.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_0302_2: When you became a Gym Leader?
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_0402_2: Yeah, that was the moment my dream began.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_1201_2:
As a Gym Leader and a top model, I want to shine
brighter than anyone else...

And Emolga has always been right there with me,
chasing that dream.

And even though she’s suuuuper famous now,
she’s still as hardworking as ever!

That’s right! And Emolga and I are always gonna
be the most dazzling sync pair!

So how about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Is there a kind of sync pair you aspire to be?
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_0401_3: That’s the spirit! Never forget that feeling.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_0402_3:
Hmm. Well...that’s all right. I’m sure deep down,
you know what I’m talking about.
charaepi_ch0106_80_kamitsure/2301_1201_3:
That feeling you had when you first decided to aim
for the stars together with your Pokémon...
That’s the purest form of your hopes and dreams.

I can’t wait to see how dazzling your future’s
gonna be.
